text:
Of a guy like you
and a girl like me...

Well, lloyd,
that's difficult to say.

Hit me with it!
Just give it to me straight!

I came a long way
just to see you, mary.

Just-- the least you can do
is level with me.

You mean not good,
like one out of 100?

I'd say more like
one out of a million.

So you're telling me
there's a chance!
